data.text: @sudesna_ghosh Thanks, Sue. My best friend over there got it, too. She's OK now, but like my family, she is double vaxxed, boosted, and careful. 'Course she works at the airport, so that's surely where she caught it.
@LynHewitson Thanks, Lyn. No idea where they got it. All double vaxxed, boosted, and careful. Am worried about the children, especially two very young babies.
@SE_Welfonder Oh My Lord, Sue, Prayers for the Kiddies, don't get it, and others sail through it, should do, Huge Health Vibes
@Francis_Sanibel True. They have no idea where/how they got it. Have been super careful.
@SE_Welfonder Always hits Europe before the US. A bellwether.
@Francis_Sanibel Oh, dear. Hadn't thought of that. I rarely go anywhere except cycling/walking, but do still wear a mask if in crowded places.

@SE_Welfonder And with the number of unvaccinated refugees from Ukraine  (only 40% vaccination rate) we may have another wave that will make it's way here. Please consider wearing a mask in crowded places.
